queries.query: powerful celestial with the ability to change alignment in battle
queries.variant: celestial that can change its alignment and is very powerful in fights

queries.query: huge celestial creature that embodies law and chaos
queries.variant: large celestial being that represents balance between law and chaos

queries.query: angelic being with high durability and magical resistance
queries.variant: angel that is very tough and resistant to magic attacks

queries.query: celestial monster with stunning gaze and weapon attacks dealing extra force damage
queries.variant: celestial creature that has a gaze that stuns and does extra force damage with weapons

queries.variant: angel that can tell when someone lies and has great perception skills
